thread.title: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education
thread.title_full: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education

title: LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education
text: > Ohio LeBron, first lady Michelle Obama promote education Cleveland Cavaliers' basketball player LeBron James listens at right as first lady Michelle Obama speaks to parents and children at The University of Akron, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Akron, Ohio. James teams up with Mrs. Obama to celebrate the importance of secondary education at a private event at the University of Akron. The NBA superstar, who went from high school to the pros, and first lady are hosting thousands of children and their parents at the school. (AP Photo/Tony Dejak)
